name: Clipboard

class_methods.detail:
The returned clipboard instance is managed by App, there is no need to
manually free it.

The returned clipboard instance is managed by App, there is no need to
manually free it.

methods.description: Return the content of clipboard as text.
Return whether the data of `type` is available.
Get the data of `type` from clipboard.
methods.detail: You should always check the type of returned data before using it.

The `<!name>on_change` event will be emitted when clipboard's content has
been changed.

On macOS, due to lack of system notifications for clipboard events, this
event is implemented by polling every 500ms.

methods.description: Return the native handle of clipboard.

events.description: Emitted when clipboard's content has been changed.
events.detail:
The `<!name>StartWatching` method must be called first to make this event
work.
